articles.title: Taiwan to India: The Trump tariffs hitting Asia - BBC
articles.description: Economies in Asia were among those hit hardest by tariffs announced by US President Donald Trump.
articles.content:
Fan Wang
Economies in Asia were among those hit hardest by tariffs announced by US President Donald Trump on "Liberation Day" in April.
From traditional US allies like Japan to the Asean bloc spann… [+5831 chars]
